cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Oversight and Accountability on September 20, 2023
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 599, a bill to designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 3500 West 6th Street, Suite 103 in Los Angeles, California, as the “Dosan Ahn Chang Ho Post Office

cboCostEstimates.description: As reported by the Senate Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs on August 1, 2024
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 599, an act to designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 3500 West 6th Street, Suite 103 in Los Angeles, California, as the “Dosan Ahn Chang Ho Post Office”

bill.constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 169, Number 18 (Friday, January 27, 2023)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. GOMEZ:
H.R. 599.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Clauses 7 and 18 of Section 8 of Article 1 of the US
Constitution
The single subject of this legislation is:
Post Office Designation
[Page H490]
bill.title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 3500 West 6th Street, Suite 103 in Los Angeles, California, as the "Dosan Ahn Chang Ho Post Office".
